comment: /** * Converts shortId to the PDB ID extended format. * If shortId is a valid short PDB ID, it would be converted to an extended ID, * if shortId is a valid extended PDB ID, it would be returned in UPPER CASE, * a {@link StructureException} is thrown otherwise. * @param shortId the PDB ID to convert to extended format * @return the ID in the extended UPPER CASE format. * @throws StructureException if the conversion was not possible. */
